Date: 2025-04-10 13:49
Subject: Our new OMS, The Podcast by Chalhoub Group, GenAI in action, Goal Setting Reminder, Farm Rio launches Shoes
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	
Powering smarter fulfillment with our new OMS 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=700&user=10620> 	

We’re introducing a new Order Management System (OMS) to improve how we process and fulfill orders. With this new system, we’ll be able to offer customers more delivery options and provide more accurate delivery timelines. It also enables services like Click&Collect and supports smoother omnichannel customer journeys.

This project brings together a committed team from Tech, Operations, Omnichannel, Ecommerce, Retail, and Change Management. It’s a true cross-functional effort, supported by our sponsors: Andreu Marco, Chief Operating Officer; Amit Keswani, Chief Omnichannel Officer; and Kamran Abbasi, Chief Data and Technology Officer.

Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=700&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

A new episode of The Podcast by Chalhoub Group

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=701&user=10620> 	

A new season, a new setup, and a new journey into operational excellence! What does it take to master operations behind the scenes of luxury? How do you balance efficiency, sustainability, and a relentless focus on the customer? To kick off our new season, Lynn Al Khatib sits down with Andreu Marco to explore the art of The Excellence Equation. Tune in through: 
Spotify <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=702&user=10620> 
Apple <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=703&user=10620> 
Anghami <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=704&user=10620> 
YouTube <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=701&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

GEN AI in Action

GEN AI in Action

Discover how GEN AI is revolutionising the workplace through the insights of Olivier Gastinel, VP of Aspirational Luxury. Watch his testimonial <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=705&user=10620>  and explore the power of AI-driven learning. Join the #GenAIChallenge!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=705&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-6-min.png> 	

4 DAYS REMAINING to set your 2025 Goals!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=706&user=10620> 	

Upload your goals in DRIVE by 15th April. After this date, the system will be locked and you will be unable to add your goals.

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=706&user=10620> 	

Upload your goals in DRIVE by 15th April. After this date, the system will be locked and you will be unable to add your goals.

Need assistance? Visit the Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=706&user=10620>  for FAQs, guidance and resources to help you set goals in alignment with the Group’s objectives. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-5-min.png> 	

WALK IN HAPPINESS WITH FARM RIO SHOES

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/9dbafb5cc5a274c88e91469eaa80d6eb967996726.png> 	

FARM Rio is expanding its vibrant offering with the launch of Shoes, designed to be a bold addition to the wardrobe of print-lovers. The collection features artisanal details, and brings the brand’s colorful and joyful ethos to footwear styles, including a variety of sandals, mules and slides. Available exclusively online and in our Mall of Emirates store. Use code CHALHOUB25 to avail 25% off your online order.

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=707&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved. 

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
